name: Shuttle Run Intervals
step_by_step: Run down and back continuously for duration

name: Hill Sprint Intervals
step_by_step: Sprint uphill hard, walk back down for recovery

name: Hill Sprint + Broad Jump Combo
step_by_step: Sprint uphill, walk down, perform broad jumps up hill, walk down, repeat

name: Treadmill Progressive Incline VO2 Run
step_by_step: 2 min warm-up at low incline, then increase incline by 0.5 every 30s for 6 min, finish with 2 min cooldown

name: Treadmill Progressive Speed VO2 Run
step_by_step: 2 min warm-up at jog pace with 4–5 incline, increase speed by 0.5 each minute for 5 min, finish with 1 min incline walk

name: Bike Mountain Climb VO2 Ladder
step_by_step: Each minute perform sprint at high resistance for 20,40,60,80,100,120,100,80,60,40,20 pedal pushes, recover remaining time

name: Bike Pyramid Power Intervals
step_by_step: Each minute sprint for 30,45,60,75,90,75,60,45,30 pedal pushes, recover remaining time

name: Bike Repeat Sprint VO2 Waves
step_by_step: Alternate minutes of 40 pedal pushes sprint and 60 pedal pushes sprint for total duration
coaching_cues: Power stays high on every effort

name: Continuous Stair Run
step_by_step: Run stairs continuously

name: Step-Up Intervals
step_by_step: Alternate step-ups continuously

name: Bike Long Climb VO2 Endurance
step_by_step: Every minute perform 70 pedal pushes at moderate-high resistance for duration

name: Bike Descending VO2 Sprints
step_by_step: Each minute sprint for 100,90,80,70,60,50,40,30 pedal pushes, recover remaining time
coaching_cues: Stay powerful even as volume drops

name: Tempo Shuttle (1:1 Rest)
step_by_step: Run shuttles, equal rest

name: Lateral Cone Touch Conditioning
step_by_step: Shuffle touching cones continuously

name: Continuous Squat Walk
step_by_step: Squat walk forward and backward

name: Change-of-Pace VO2 Run
step_by_step: Alternate 30s hard run and 30s moderate run continuously for duration

name: Curved Treadmill 1 Minute Sprint Interval
step_by_step: 5 hard sprints using prescribed work/rest options
coaching_cues: Increase sprint time gradually, cap at 30/30

name: Continuous Lateral Push VO2
step_by_step: Continuous lateral push-offs side to side for duration

name: Forward-Lateral Combo Conditioning
step_by_step: Run forward then lateral shuffle

name: Lunge-Run Combo Intervals
step_by_step: Alternate 30s walking lunges and 30s light run
